title: English Speaking Proficiency Enhancement Program Using ChatGPT and BOPPPS

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A program optimized for smartphone-based microlearning environments, targeting professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% fluency scores in 3-minute English presentations on a given topic by applying ChatGPT strategies at each stage of the BOPPPS framework.
Learners generate appropriate interactive responses in role-play scenarios with over 70% accuracy through AI-based metacognitive dialogue training.
Learners demonstrate a 25% or greater improvement in discourse management skills at the end of the 1-week course compared to pre-assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
